code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import{useCart}from'../CartContext';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Product=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[product,setProduct]=useState(null);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const{dispatch}=useCart();useEffect(()=>{axios.get("https://v2.api.noroff.dev/online-shop/".concat(id)).then(response=>{setProduct(response.data.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error('There was an error fetching the product!',error);setError(error.message);});},[id]);const addToCart=()=>{dispatch({type:'ADD_TO_CART',product});};if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Error: ",error]});if(!product)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});const{title,description,image,price,discountedPrice,reviews}=product;const discount=price&&discountedPrice&&price>discountedPrice?(price-discountedPrice)/price*100:0;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image&&image.url?image.url:'https://via.placeholder.com/300',alt:title||"Product image",className:"product-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: $",discountedPrice?discountedPrice.toFixed(2):price.toFixed(2),discount>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[" (",discount.toFixed(0),"% off)"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addToCart,children:"Add to Cart"}),reviews&&reviews.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Reviews"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:reviews.map(review=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:[review.username,":"]})," ",review.description," (Rating: ",review.rating,")"]})},review.id))})]})]});};export default Product;
